title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 104.5 - Confidentiality
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 104.5 - Confidentiality

State Regulations

Court records that are reproduced in an
alternative format, retained for research purposes or designated for
disposition remain subject to all statutory provisions pertaining to access and
confidentiality that are applicable to the original records. Arrangements for
the reproduction, retention or disposal of court records that are sealed or
otherwise deemed confidential must preserve the level of protection and
non-access required by law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
104.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
